section.p: You can create an exclusion list from an existing new terms list or found terms list. This procedure is explained in .
You can also create an exclusion list from the New Exclusion List window or the Edit Exclusion List window.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The Exclusion Lists window is active.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p: Select Newâ€¦ from the File menu.
The New Exclusion List window is displayed.

section.title: Options and parameters
section.p:
The upper list box is empty. Here you can define the terms for the new exclusion list:
To add a term, press Enter and type a term in the empty line.
To delete a term already entered, mark it with the mouse and press Enter.
To change a term already entered, overtype it. Pasting from the clipboard is also supported.

plentry.pd: Type the name of the new exclusion list.

section.p: To save the terms in the new exclusion list, select the Create button.
If you do not want to create the exclusion list anymore, select the Cancel button.

section.title: Results
section.p: If you selected the Create button, the exclusion list is created with the terms entered and you can use it in the analysis of a document.
If you selected the Cancel button, no new exclusion list is created.
